TopicTitle: One of each and every kind

Articles.Content:
Build a craft which uses exactly one of each part in the game. DLC is allowed but if you do use one part from a given DLC, you need to use every single part from that DLC, and it will be a separate category.

Scoring:

+10 points for entering a body's sphere of influence for the first time.

+10 points for the first crewed or uncrewed landing on a celestial body other than Kerbin and 10 points for every subsequent one on a different body.

+10 points for each crewed landing.

+10 points for every Kerbal that lands on a body.

-50 points per Kerbal killed or stranded.

Discarding parts without gaining any benefit from them is heavily discouraged but hard to write scoring for.
